answer.text: EYK is a EY Knowledge database that contains all audit rules required for engagement.
EYK stands for Ernst & Young Knowledge - it's a comprehensive repository of audit methodologies, procedures, and regulatory requirements.
Also known as CCP and it is used to communicate the external user with the canvas auditor. (visa versa)
The Client Communication Portal (CCP) is a secure platform that enables two-way communication between auditors and clients during the audit process.
It allows clients to upload documents, respond to audit requests, and track the progress of their audit engagement in real-time.
